history.proof: simpl. intros H1 H2. destruct H2 as [e H2]. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet m : msg TaggedMessage H1 : soup_coh (dsoup d) e : nat H2 : coh_msg m e Unable to unify "coh_msg m e" with "soup_coh (dsoup d \\+ fresh (dsoup d) \\\\-> m)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
d: dstatelet
m: msg TaggedMessage

Goal:
soup_coh (dsoup d) -> (exists e : nat_eqType, coh_msg m e) -> soup_coh (post_msg (dsoup d) m).1

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
coh_msg = fun (pkt : msg TaggedMessage) (e : nat_eqType) => if from pkt == server then to pkt \in clients /\ msg_from_server (content pkt) e else if from pkt \in clients then to pkt == server /\ msg_from_client (content pkt) else False : msg TaggedMessage -> nat_eqType -> Prop
soup_coh = Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> active ms -> exists e : nat_eqType, coh_msg ms e)] : Pred soup
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
nid = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohIVs : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI p I d -> valid (dsoup d)
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
post_fresh : forall (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage), (post_msg s m).2 \notin dom s
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
Variant big_enum_spec (I : fintype.Finite.type) (P : pred (fintype.Finite.sort I)) : seq (fintype.Finite.sort I) -> Type := BigEnumSpec : forall e : seq (fintype.Finite.sort I), (forall (R : Type) (idx : R) (op : R -> R -> R) (F : fintype.Finite.sort I -> R), bigop.BigOp.bigop idx e (fun i : fintype.Finite.sort I => bigop.BigBody i op true (F i)) = bigop.BigOp.bigop idx (bigop.index_enum I) (fun i : fintype.Finite.sort I => bigop.BigBody i op (P i) (F i))) -> uniq e /\ (forall i : fintype.Finite.eqType I, (i \in e) = P i) ->...-> bigop.big_enum_spec P e Arguments bigop.big_enum_spec [I] _ _%seq_scope Arguments bigop.BigEnumSpec [I P] [e]%seq_scope _%function_scope
bigop.BigEnumSpec : forall (I : fintype.Finite.type) (P : pred (fintype.Finite.sort I)) (e : seq (fintype.Finite.sort I)), (forall (R : Type) (idx : R) (op : R -> R -> R) (F : fintype.Finite.sort I -> R), bigop.BigOp.bigop idx e (fun i : fintype.Finite.sort I => bigop.BigBody i op true (F i)) = bigop.BigOp.bigop idx (bigop.index_enum I) (fun i : fintype.Finite.sort I => bigop.BigBody i op (P i) (F i))) -> uniq e /\ (forall i : fintype.Finite.eqType I, (i \in e) = P i) -> (let cP := [pred i | P i] in perm_eq e (fintype.enum_mem (mem cP)) /\ size e = fintype.CardDef.card (mem cP)) -> bigop.big_enum_spec P e
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
step_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
step_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
rely_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
rely_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
client_nodes : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> n \in nodes
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
is_active = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
is_consumed = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
client_not_server : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> (n == server) = false
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
bigop.index_iota = fun m n : nat => iota m (n - m) : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments bigop.index_iota (_ _)%nat_scope
msg_from_client = fun ms : TaggedMessage => ((tag ms == acquire_tag) || (tag ms == release_tag)) && (ms == [::]) : TaggedMessage -> bool
Inductive heap : Type := Undef : heap | Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap Arguments Heap.Def [finmap]
msg_from_server = fun (ms : TaggedMessage) (e : nat_eqType) => (tag ms == grant_tag) && (ms == [:: e]) : TaggedMessage -> nat_eqType -> bool

```simpl.
intros H1 H2.
destruct H2 as [e H2].
exists e.
exact H2.

original: simpl. intros H1 H2. destruct H2 as [e H2]. exists e. apply H2.
